Package nanovm.nibobee.drivers

Provides static classes to acces the hardware of the Nibo robot.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bot Gives access to general information about the Nibo robot.
Clock Encapsulates time information and delay methods.
Leds Provides methods to control the LEDs.
LineDetector Encapsulates the information about the two IR-reflex-sensors for line detection.
Motor Provides methods for the motor controll.
Sensor Encapsulates the information about the antenna sensors
WheelEncoder Encapsulates the information about the wheels rotation.
 

Package nanovm.nibobee.drivers Description

Provides static classes to acces the hardware of the Nibo robot.
